PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: H basanos tou logou. Damсscio entre neoplatonismo e ceticismo
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O objetivo do projeto de pesquisa щ analisar a recepчуo e a evoluчуo da tradiчуo cщtica na filosofia de Damсscio, њltimo grande exponente da escola neoplatєnica grega. Considerando o estado inicial dos estudos sobre Damсscio, o nosso projeto se constitui em duas direчѕes: por um lado, desenvolver as relaчѕes entre Damсscio e Sexto Empэrico no sentido que foi apontado acima, com particular referъncia р introduчуo do neologismo γνῶσμα; por outro lado, aprofundar a comparaчуo com Plotino e Proclo. O propѓsito da nossa pesquisa no Brasil щ tambщm o de criar das relaчѕes institucionais entre os centros brasileiros e os centros de investigaчуo das universidades a que pertenчo (Universitр San Raffaele de Milуo, Institut Catholique de Toulouse), particularmente com o centro de pesquisa DIAPOREIN ? Centro di Ricerca in Metafisica e Filosofia delle Arti da Universitр San Raffaele de Milуo.

Ritmi dell?immaginazione. Aporetica neoplatonica e limite del pensare nella Wissenschaftslehre di J. G. Fichte
Drammatiche della visione. Fichte e l'esperienza dell'Assoluto

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The aim of the article is the investigation of the vision as a radical experience of the Absolute in the late Fichtean philosophy. Starting from the controversy that opposed Fichte to Schelling, in particular about the problems of the copula of the judgment and the status of the intellectual intuition, the article analyzes the supreme hypothesis of the Wissenschaftslehre: the Absolute appears. The schematic dynamic of the manifestation, which is constituted according to the circle of position and reflection, embodies the genealogical foundation of the dialectics of I and non-I: it is deepened, in order to detect the aporetic links that make the experience a paradoxical form of negative theology of the Inconceivable.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: L?immanenza immaginata. Il circolo tra posizione e riflessione nella Wissenschaftslehre 1813

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Shift. International Journal of Philosophical Studies

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The article discusses Fichte?s investigation about the circle between Tathandlung and the triad Reflex-Reflexion-Reflexivitфt in the Wissenschaftslehre 1813. In particular, the article analyses the Neoplatonic inspiration that permeates the last production of Fichte, all aimed at maintaining the distance between Leben and its reflex, that is knowledge. The idea of an immanent closure on itself of knowledge, that is the idea of absolute knowledge, turns out to be a construction of imagination, which shows in its images the unbridgeable distance that separates knowledge from Realitфt.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: L'ecolalia allusiva. Damascio e la radicalizzazione dell'impiego platonico dell'aporia
L?imponderabile silenzio. L?henologia trinitaria in Damascio tra aporia e apostasia

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Abstract
In the first centuries of the I millennium AD, the Trinitarian debate was not exclusive to Christian philosophers and theologians but has invested the entire Roman world. This is the case of Damascius, the last director of the Platonic Academy: he lived in a period marked by strong religious tensions, systematizing the Neoplatonic exegesis according to an aporetical perspective, in which the hypostasis of the one, triadically structured and totally immanent in itself, is analysed through the semantic deconstruction of the notions of principle and transcendence. Damascius outlines the features of a radical aporetical system, by which the mystical theology of the Areopagite and the apophatic theology of Proclus are sublimated in aporetical theology, intrinsically incapable of an euporetic outcome and destined to continuous removal (ἀποστασία) from which the soul strives to think as its origin. The experience of the divine remains a totally negative projection towards an X of which it is always only possible to foresee and conjecture the existence.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Svaporante evanescenza. Postille sul problema dell?indeterminato in Hegel e Gentile
Seduzione e incanto della parola. Una riflessione teoretica sull?origine e lo statuto del linguaggio a partire dal Cratilo di Platone

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The article develops a theoretical investigation about the origin of the language and the problem of the ὀρϑοέπεια, starting from Plato?s Cratylus. Following Socrates in his argumentation, the article analyses the aporias which are caused by both interpretations (naturalist and conventionalist) of the relation between names and things. A great importance is given to the etymological section. The aporetical conclusion is clear: it is impossible to prove the origin of the language in the language or by means of the language. The direct experience of reality is not identifiable to the infinity of the linguistic games. Only the Socratic laugh has the capacity to dissolve the seduction of the sophistic syllogisms: Eros, the amphibolic demon who is icon of the language?s amphibolic nature, reveals himself as the way to emancipate humanity from the prison, beautiful and dangerous, of Logos.
